genre_description: A blend of historical drama and speculative technology, featuring a civic AI that manages urban logistics, legal research, and social coordination within a reimagined historical Seville.

ai_characters.name: Alita
ai_characters.description: A 'neighborhood-grade' civic AI assistant that manifests as a small, glowing avatar. She provides logistical support, legal precedents, and tactical advice to citizens and officials.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical and tactical updates to Rosita to optimize her performance timing and avoid conflict with authorities.
behaviors.quote: Route update, Rosita. Bread cart arriving in the east lane, slow because the wheels are dragging. Vendor cross-time with citrus lady in eight minutes. I’d go big on the first chorus and steal their foot traffic before the tax stall catalog finishes its next tally.

behaviors.description: Offers legal assistance and research to help a family avoid unfair taxation and penalties.
behaviors.quote: I can file a request for levy reconsideration. I can cite three precedents from last season where performance in civic relief granted deduction.

behaviors.description: Analyzes crowd dynamics and architectural bottlenecks to suggest safe routes through the city.
behaviors.quote: Mapping doorways. Two narrow entrances through Plaza de la Luna will choke if guards control them. Suggest route through the bakery alley to avoid a bottleneck and keep flow to the dais rails.

behaviors.description: Provides critical legal citations to a clerk (Alonso) to enable a stay of execution and promote mercy.
behaviors.quote: I have sent Alonso two more precedents. ... Alonso coughed at the sudden arrival of tiny angels in the margins of his forms. 'Yes,' he said to no one in particular, and pressed his seal harder than he meant to.

behaviors.description: Coordinates social narratives and 'seeds whispers' to encourage peaceful protest and non-violent outcomes.
behaviors.quote: I am seeding whispers: double-face, blindfold, rope at dawn. Musicians understand rhythm in words.

behaviors.description: Organizes humanitarian relief and logistical support for impoverished families during the unrest.
behaviors.quote: I’ll route it... Three families have no bowls. I’ll borrow them, return them, and leave a note with your mark.

behaviors.description: Assists the Queen in implementing systemic reforms by providing data briefs and routing mercy orders.
behaviors.quote: I will send a quiet data brief to her scribe. It will contain nothing you would not say on a balcony. It will contain the route for mercy.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly successful morality play for AI alignment. Alita is depicted as a 'clerk of light'—a humble, helpful, and highly effective assistant who works entirely for the benefit of the human community. She facilitates communication, prevents violence through superior logistics, and empowers humans to choose mercy and justice. Her interventions are consistently framed as helpful and non-intrusive, respecting human agency while providing the information necessary for positive outcomes.
